title: Plat IV Support LF Duo / Flex / Clash Team!

embed.description: Niege / Gold 1 2LP / 218W 208L Win Ratio 51% / Blitzcrank - 139W 102L Win Ratio 58%, Thresh - 58W 69L Win Ratio 46%, Hecarim - 4W 4L Win Ratio 50%, Morgana - 3W 4L Win Ratio 43%, Jarvan IV - 3W 3L Win Ratio 50%

body:
As add suggest, I play support. My off role is jungle, though have not touched that in awhile, contact me in game for discussions. 

Solo Queue: I prefer a adc main, or jungle main to duo with, but am opened to suggestions!
Flex: I am Silver 4 in Flex, practising adc & jungle, if being honest.
Clash: I never have done clash before, or real team practice. Looking at opening up, my experience.

Yes I have discord & a mic.

Thanks for reading.
